casebody.data:
VILLAGE APARTMENTS, LLC
v.
Stanley P. WARD, Jr., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 1, 2017

Matthew G. Berger, in support of the petition.

Garon Camassar, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 653, 152 A.3d 76 (2016), is denied.
